PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13982019-12-19,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActOperational Service Medal Regulations
SubjectOrder Awarding the Operational Service Medal With the HAITI Ribbon
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2010-1095 of September 2, 2010 and Order in Council P.C. 2012-334 of March 20, 2012; (2) determining the eligibility criteria worthy of recognition by the award of the Operational Service Medal with the HAITI ribbon; (3) specifying the appearance of the HAITI ribbon; and (4) establishing the order of precedence of the Operational Service Medal with the HAITI ribbon in the Canadian Honours System.
AttachmentsAttachment
